rows.label: qst201509_msg0035
rows.name: 16 times, was it?

rows.label: qst201509_msg0036
rows.name:
I was watching very closely, but
I must have overlooked that part.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0037
rows.name:
You can't be expected to keep watch
every hour of the day. Even the
greatest of Blades make mistakes.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0038
rows.name: You're right. Thank you.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0039
rows.name: All right. Opportunity knocks...

rows.label: qst201509_msg0040
rows.name:
*knock knock knock knock knock
knock knock knock knock knock knock
knock knock knock knock knock...*

rows.label: qst201509_msg0041
rows.name:
Whew. The Nopon was right.
That was a little tiring on the arms...

rows.label: qst201509_msg0001
rows.name: Lapacoll, I presume?

rows.label: qst201509_msg0002
rows.name:
Yes, that is my name.
And you are...?

rows.label: qst201509_msg0003
rows.name:
We couldn't help but notice you've
been gathering large quantities of
Thanazalea. Care to tell us why?

rows.label: qst201509_msg0004
rows.name:
Thanazalea?! I-I don't know what
you're talking about...

rows.label: qst201509_msg0005
rows.name: Oh really...

rows.label: qst201509_msg0010
rows.name:
You were extracting their toxins to
make poison, weren't you? And
quite a potent poison at that...

rows.label: qst201509_msg0011
rows.name: What...? How did you...

rows.label: qst201509_msg0012
rows.name:
There's nothing that slips past me,
my dear.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0042
rows.name:
I don't suppose you know, but the
vessel carrying your shipments sailed
its final voyage a short while ago...

rows.label: qst201509_msg0043
rows.name:
Oh, and you should probably know that
your two hired hands won't be picking
any more flowers either.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0044
rows.name:
Oh, my. You're all alone with no one
left to help you. You poor soul.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0013
rows.name:
I'm going to ask you nicely. Give it up
and tell us what you've been trying to
do here.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0014
rows.name: I...I'll never tell! Never!

rows.label: qst201509_msg0015
rows.name:
I would really advise you to co-operate
with us here. For your own good.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0016
rows.name:
My Clairvoyant Eye sees all.
So don't try any funny business,
because it's not going to work.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0017
rows.name: Ugh...

rows.label: qst201509_msg0018
rows.name:
The game's up. Why don't you just
come clean? You'll feel a whole lot
better, trust me.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0019
rows.name:
...I was contracted. By a man from
Gula.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0020
rows.name:
The poison I've been making...
Thanatitan... I was meant to send it
by boat to my contractor, overseas.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0021
rows.name:
Normally we'd have been able to do
it in two shipments.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0034
rows.name:
But the previous ship sank before
it reached its destination, and the
poison along with it.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0022
rows.name:
That would be the ship that Azami
sank...

rows.label: qst201509_msg0023
rows.name:
So...we made another batch.
Of Thanatitan.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0024
rows.name: Which was on the ship we boarded...

rows.label: qst201509_msg0025
rows.name:
What are you planning to do with
such a huge quantity of poison?

rows.label: qst201509_msg0026
rows.name:
The clue's in the name. Thanatitan
induces a paralytic effect on a Divine Beast's
nervous system, debilitating it.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0027
rows.name: What?!

rows.label: qst201509_msg0028
rows.name:
My contractor is trying to inject the
Thanatitan directly into the body of
a Divine Beast to make it weaker.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0045
rows.name:
I'm guessing they can still carry out
their plan using the first shipment?

rows.label: qst201509_msg0046
rows.name:
They can. The first shipment arrived
safely at the destination.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0029
rows.name: What destination?

rows.label: qst201509_msg0030
rows.name: I'm afraid I can't tell you.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0031
rows.name:
It was my job to load up the ship
with the stuff. They didn't tell me
where it was going.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0032
rows.name: ...Clever.

rows.label: qst201509_msg0033
rows.name:
So we're at a loose end now.
This is worrying...
